# contains(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the focus environment contains the specified environment.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency func contains(_ environment: any UIFocusEnvironment) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **environment**: The focus environment to check.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if `environment` is contained by the current focus environment or [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] if it is not.

## Checking the ancestry of the environment

- **parentFocusEnvironment**: The parent focus environment for this environment.
- **focusItemContainer**: The container for the child focus items in this focus environment.
